website_summaries.verdict: The Optoma GT760 gaming projector won't let you take full advantage of the high resolution of the newest crop of game systems, but it delivers a short throw, a bright image, and HDMI 3D support.
pros: 3D with Blu-ray players and other video sources
cons: Native resolution is lower than today's latest gaming systems offer

customer_reviews.title: Great home theater projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a great projector. We use it in our home daily and have several sources running to it, all of which it handles like a pro. Great value for the money and a nice clear image, even during daylight hours. We do use blackout shades on the windows closest to where we project, but even with some ambient light in the room we can watch it no problem. We have no need for a TV again.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyDK

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Steal!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I looked at a bunch of projectors and considered purchasing one for around 1000 bucks. But when I seen this one with good reviews and about 300 dollars cheaper than the Benq I was looking at. I decided to go with it and I'm glad I did. The only reason I almost hesitated and buy this projector was because it's rated at 720p. And to be honest I can't tell my led46 inch tv looks any better in 1080p then this projector does. I got sitting on a little table in my garage right beside my ps4 and play games for hours straight on, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: Best unit for its price range
customer_reviews.text: Been using Optoma projectors for a long time now. Best unit for its price range. Littler bit hard to line up to screen because lack of / limited zoom and tilt features. Nice bright images even in low light conditions. Fan is louder than most, a good sound system is needed, Built in speaker is nothing amazing. Bulb last long time even with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 3D on a budget projector
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this projector over the BenQ W710st, this unlike the Benq has $300 of extra features. TRUE 3D, WITHOUT extra equipment. We hooked our Star Wars 360 up to it, and turned on black ops 3D zombies with DLP link glasses, flipped the conveinent 3D switch on the projector remote and boom, mind blown by the 3D. AWESOME... My only complaint is the picture quality isnt the best, but to be honest? it really does the trick...1080p looks fuzzy, but 720 looks fantastic, and since netflix streams at 720p this is perfect. Highly recommend. and I will be buying a 1080p version if they ever release it.
customer_reviews.author: Soas

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Projector
customer_reviews.text: Really impressive brightness and can easily fill an entire wall. Bought this for my company and my Executive Team fell in love with it. Will likely be buying more soon! Also, not as loud as everyone complained and I had it sitting very close to me. Speakers are "meh" at best, but that's to be expected with mono, built-in speakers. Overall: Great buy for home or work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Innes

customer_reviews.title: Just passed the 1 year mark....no worries!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had planned to get a fixed screen for this projector to get the most out of it. Since day one its been pointed at a beige wall and honestly it works just fine. Using my PC for the source 95% of the time it really works flawless. Its bright, its beautiful, and it gets the job done. On the downside it offers little to help you square the image up in adjustments, so you have to set it up perfectly if you're trying to fit the image into a fixed screen. Also, dont forget its 16:10, limits your screen choices. Look forward to hopefully another year out of this awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: I loved this projector so much
customer_reviews.text: I loved this projector so much. It recently died because we have bugs and my complex sprayed and I guess between the spray and the bugs it was too much for this little guy. While the contrast on the gt760 is better it lacks a second hdmi port and component audio so I can no longer have my computer, wii, 360, and ps3 plugged in at once. The gt750e was the best projector for me and I would have gotten another one when mine broke if they weren't discontinued making sure nobody put them on sale anymore. I am the sadness only because after 2 years I lost the best item I've ever owned to bugs.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good travel and presentation unit
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use in the living room, but ended up using it as a meetings' rental unit. Semi- short throw helps reduce projection distance and uses less of the meeting space, I also purchased a Duratool MJ-138-18" Weatherproof Tool Box - 16.8" x 11.4" x 6.1" ID to travel with it. Both have worked out spectacularly. I will but the newer model in 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector
customer_reviews.text: Received this last week, but I was on vacation - and for once, I couldnt wait to get back from vacation to play .... Well, if you are considering this purchase - stop debating and do it. I have used my PS3 and NVidia PlayTV from my laptop and this projector is awesome from a 3D and a 2D prospective. So far there is no downside to this projector - I dont use it as my main setup - but I use it for some gaming and movie viewing on my new 120" Projector Screen ....
customer_reviews.author: PensFan66

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good projector, have purchased three of them. Having the projector close to the screen allows a presenter to walk about and point at the images without getting blinded. Probably a little dark for most video unless you are in a very dim room, but does business presentations very nicely, even with a fair amount of room light.
customer_reviews.author: Joel P

customer_reviews.title: 3D function looks amazing with 3D blu rays
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. nice bright picture 720p looks great on my 12ft screen I bought a warranty for this projector because my last two optoma projectors also looked great, but crapped out in a little over 2 years 3D function looks amazing with 3D blu rays Even though it is 720p, the blu ray images look stunning, as good as my 1080p 50" flat. As to endurance, time will tell
customer_reviews.author: cinebiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases ever. my son plays call of duty on this projector alot with all of the lights on and it still looks pretty good. My only gripe was the limited placement. It really only works well sitting in front of the projector about 6 feet from the screenfor a 120 inch screen. But the portability is great i have moved it outside and played movies on the side of the house many of times.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Mind-blowing how close you can keep the projector to a 120" screen.
customer_reviews.text: It blows my mind how this projector is able to create such a wide image from only a couple feet away. We use it at our education facility on a 120 inch screen, and it delivers a beautiful and bright picture with excellent contrast. We're about to get a ceiling mount for it, so we can reclaim the space normally used as a projector table.
customer_reviews.author: therealcheesecake

customer_reviews.title: The picture is good, it's easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine anyone having any complaints about this projector, as long as they are actually looking for a short throw projector and you keep in mind the price. The picture is good, it's easy to adjust, and it's very bright. A USB port would be nice, but if it were perfect it would cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: My review, so far...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the projector for a short time. For that short time, it is awesome. The image is sharp, it is like having a 90'' LCD television on the wall. The speakers for the projector work fantastic too. Volume level 1 is almost too loud when watching while the family is sleeping. I had to order headphones for the Xbox 360 so that I wouldn't wake anyone while gaming at night. The projector is everything I was looking for and didn't know I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Obenhaus

customer_reviews.title: works great, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: bought this from amazon and delivered to singapore where I'm based. easy to setup and it projects a huge picture. I had it setup over my TV, hooked up 2 consoles and works great. the sound from projector is loud enough - I was worried about this initially but it works out fine. comes in a backpack which is good to storing. some decent settings that let you zoom and tilt the image.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for half a year now and still love it! I bought a 4-pack of Sainsonic 3d glasses and watching 3d movies at my house is no different than the theaters, it's amazing! Also, the throw on it is great if you have a small space. I get close to 200 inches being about 6 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Take my wife, leave the projector
customer_reviews.text: This short throw is amazing. I use it for cable box and one of my gaming pc systems. Very easy to adjust and customize. Very quiet. You can't beat the quality for this price, can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Optima GT750
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for GAMING and Gaming only at 720P you will not get the resolution that you would like to have while watching a HD movie. All of the countrols are easily manipulated and easy to locate although the major problem is with the remote. The remote is BRIGHT and by bright I mean sear your eyeballs out bright in a low lit room! the back lit buttons on the remote light up like a blue becon when depressed and destroys the mood of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron G. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Optoma GT750E
customer_reviews.text: It is my first projector and haven't use the 3D capability yet and my first impression is WOW! Even my wife is amaze with the bright and clear video on a big screen. We've watch our friends projector and their quiet impressive but nothing compared to my projector in terms of picture quality. Highly recommended projector to buy even my friends are impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dick C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Video Projector but very low light
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Video Projector, the lenses themselves are a fine piece of art, its really cool, the image is bigger than expected!! BUT BEWARE THIS IS A VERY LOW INTENSITY LIGHT, IF YOU HAVE ANY LIGHT IN THE ROOM YOU WILL NOT SEE A CLEAR IMAGE, WISH IT HAS MORE LUMENS
customer_reviews.author: reset77

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you have low budget this is your best option. I got a high light room so I If I want a good experience (gaming, movie, etc) I have to make dark the room. I have not tried 3D features yet. Be aware this is for small rooms, in other words, you must mount the projector 6ft away from screen to get an image of 8ft width.
customer_reviews.author: Korsario

customer_reviews.title: practical
customer_reviews.text: good price, great quality, easy to configure. perfect for first time projector customers. just make sure to place in near the screen or wall, because this is a short distance type. put the projector screen first before you determine how far the projector would be, especially if you are planning to mount it on the ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Nunz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful projector!
customer_reviews.text: This Optoma projector worked perfectly out of the box. Did not need to change any settings. The picture is bright and color is brilliant, much better than our earlier GT720. So far it has been a great purchase. I have not yet used the included 3D capabilities yet as I bought this mostly for watching movies in HD. For that it is perfect. Games also look really great on the huge projection screen. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: James McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for the money, however when I received it the sound card wasn't working properly as it would not recognize any line-in devices. Sadly, my rca plugin isn't working anymore either and the small speaker on the projector itself is crackling and slowly dying. Mine was a refurbished product so be careful when buying such an item. All in all, if this projector was working correctly, I would rate it a 5/5. Unfortunately, that wasn't the case.
customer_reviews.author: Davmy1000

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend is so happy and loves showing off to all his friends
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for about a year now and it's been great. from about 6 or 8 feet away it fills our whole 8' x 12' wall. Unfortunately we don't have a computer that can output 3d, so that part we haven't gotten much chance to play with, but generally easy to adjust and such. We have it ceiling mounted about 4" down.
customer_reviews.author: a.a.

customer_reviews.title: nice package!
customer_reviews.text: Nice projector for the price! has all the connections you need to hook up anything. I ceiling mounted this projector. Be sure to get a mount that is specific to THIS model projector not a universal type. Great picture. Bulbs are priced reasonable. Comes with a nice lighted remote with full features.
customer_reviews.author: David Opfer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely gets the job done, but I definitely prefer ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gets the job done, but I definitely prefer my (sadly discontinued) BenQ W710ST's. I run a gallery and do lots of projection-based pieces, so I use a lot of short-throw projectors, and I bought two of these and have been just kind of 'meh' about them. Mostly, the adjustable feet lack and quick-release spring loaded ability, which means that moving them to and from different settings means more of a hassle getting them aligned correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Chatham

customer_reviews.title: love it!!! but bulb broke quick :(
customer_reviews.text: I really love this projector!! I have had it for a few months now and I use it for gaming mostly.. Netflix on occasion. the only issue I had with it is the bulb broke randomly..Had to buy another bulb for 130 dollars to fix it but the fix was easy and works just fine now (: overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Teara Rosendahl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our 3D scanner and are happy with the projectors
customer_reviews.author: Sky Leap

customer_reviews.title: great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This projector was great for movie night. I'm sure some videophiles would find something to nit pick...but I love it. Works great w/ camp chef 120" screen. My kids loved watching their movies and of course I had to hook up the PS4. IMO for the price it's a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: My favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I love this thing. 3D blu-ray looks great. 3D games look great. The brightness is more than adequate. I like the short throw distance 108 inches at about 5 feet. The rbe is noticeable on non HD sources but I don't use it very often for things like this. A great value. Just buy one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kain

customer_reviews.title: Optima GT760
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the projector for our church. We needed a ultra short throw that would give us a huge screen in a very tight space. Also we need to use our existing wireless transmitter/receiver system which the GT760 accommodated. So, we are extremely happy and on top of it all it was very affordable for everything that it offers. We would recommend it to anyone for tight spaces wanting a very large presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Westerman

customer_reviews.title: Good projector but not with the latest features
customer_reviews.text: Its 720p, and it doesn't really have zoom or shifting capability. Also, the resolution is not exactly 16x9, so light does go on the outside of the screen (although I can only see it when the projector powers up and when it switches resolutions - can't see it in normal viewing). If it wasn't for the two issues above, I'd give it 5 stars. The short throw is fantastic. I'm doing about 120" about 6 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Filip S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and quite
customer_reviews.text: Almost didn't buy this product based on one reviewer complaining of the loud noise this projector makes - but I can't disagree more. The fan noise is silent. The quality of the image is excellent for movies and video games. Takes a little time adjusting to the screen, but once it is aligned, it's simply incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCoy

customer_reviews.title: This was our replacement and we couldn't be happier. Great picture even when we have the blinds ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to go with a more 'economical' version at first took about 2 days of using it to be sure we'd made a mistake. This was our replacement and we couldn't be happier. Great picture even when we have the blinds open, obviously direct sunlight is an issue but that's to be expected with any projector :P
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Projector purchase. after checking over different options i opted for Optoma GT750E for 2 reasons. 1> to view 3D movies 2> Connecting to my Playstaion. Its been 6 months and i have no problems with the projector though I Purchased a REFURBISHED product from Amazon. I loved the service and product. Pros: Easy connectivity, swap across different devices, low noise, bright picture. Cons: No 3D glasses (included), not suited best under light.
customer_reviews.author: KSMU

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews on this projector, both on amazon and a few other review sites. I felt very confident with buying this unit. I received it quickly and got a great deal on it. Set up only took 3 minutes. Yes, I am serious ONLY 3 minutes. I put it through test after test. Picture quality is outstanding in low level lighting. It is a great movie and gaming projector. I have been more then happy with the optoma and quality and am planning on buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Would have bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This is my Baby, i have a few projectors and this is my newest, LOVE IT, use it everyday for TV and spend about 8 hours sunday whatching the games. The 3d is even great, on my wal this is Huge, 3d jumps out at you.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Meyer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PROJECTOR
customer_reviews.text: This is my Third projector and I am in Love with this thing... Perfect for PC TV Gaming .... The only issue with this is the installation on a ceiling mount is a bit tricky to get the screen size right... When used with a Proper screen this thing shines... Plus Im still using the same bulb after two years of Heavy Use.... GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used my Samsung LCD since I got this projector!! It's great for watching 3D movies form my PS3, even playing 3D video games like GT5 and Call of duty. I bought with this projector a SainSonic SSZ-200DLW 3D Active Shutter Glasses and it works very well. Also, I watched Avatar and the experience was indescribable!! I'm very glad that I bought Optoma :)
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose projector + cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Love the short throw. We have projector setup 2 feet from screen and can get a great 100 in image. Worked great for world cup, and now we use for family movie nights. Its real quiet and does not get hot, pretty amazing for less than 500 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: mom2chix

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this projector for a few months now. I must say this is definitely an upgrade over my 32 inch LCD, for about the same price. I have it on a projector screen now, but it looked just as good on my white wall. Video game immersion is incredible. The backpack and built-in speaker make it very portable. The speaker is little weak on its own, but that is true for TVs as well. I have not purchased the 3D glasses, so I can't speak to that. For the price this is definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another tv again...I am a regular guy...so set up was tricky. 3d viewing was impossible and frustrating at first...but I got my friend over to help me and now im watching 3d movies on my 125 " screen...woot woot!! It didn't come w 3d glasses so we had to order 3 pairs but this picture is amazing. I thought I would have to buy a proj screen but it is on my white textured wall and it looks awesum...tvs r for suckers!!! Projecters baby :) I tell everyone about it...I wish I woulda got 1 sooner.
customer_reviews.author: tattoo dave

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product all around
customer_reviews.text: I've used this thing daily for about 2 years. Just a great product all around. I love it. I use it when my band plays, I do VJ gigs at parties with it, I watch 3D movies at home. Practically flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I used this projector for Vacation bible School to do a 220" diameter. It threw that distance in 12 ft!!! Room had to be dark for best viewing. For the price, you can't beat this one. I have not used the 3d function, but love this as a great portable projector for large and small images.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the projector
customer_reviews.text: I had one other DLP projector before this one but this HD 3D projector is very good value for money. Clarity is great and is very bright to be used in day time non dark situations.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur G

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector. The short throw really makes a big ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice projector. The short throw really makes a big difference to be able to see a big image even when in a small conference room. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: gsaloma

customer_reviews.title: Great All around projector
customer_reviews.text: Great All around projector. I use this for teaching CPR and First AID and at home we set up a 5' x 9' screen in the backyard for movie nights. I use it with a Bose sounddock for great audio to go with the great video. I use it with an xbox360 and my laptop for presentations and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector for the price, I have now purchased 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: James Travis III

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: all my friends are doing this now. I no longer have a TV and i barely go out to movies. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love the minimal distance this needs to project. The colors change pretty drastically between presets but you can customize your output in the advanced menu. Nice and bright and can be screwed into a tripod head for versatility. Does put out some noise but nothing as bad as what people have written in reviews. For the money, it looks great!.
customer_reviews.author: matt nasi

customer_reviews.title: House projection, Halloween and Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Chose this projector based upon DIYChristmas site. Best deal for the price, works perfectly. I also use it for 3D movies.
customer_reviews.author: stallion enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Projector worked great for about 2 months, then something was happening with the power on/off function. Did RMA thru Optoma they repaired it and its been working perfectly ever since. Black Ops II on a 110" screen; 3D movies; beautiful picture. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Al B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing. I use it to watch Netlfix, downloaded movies, computer games, etc. The image quality is superb. I don't use the built-in sound because I have a stereo. My setup: Optima > HDMI to laptop > 1/8 inch to RCA to old stereo I set up the projector about 4 feet to get nearly a 200" diagnoal screen on my white wall. View settings: movie and sometimes in sRGB Daylight viewing: it's not the best for daylight, but you can accomplish this if you put the projector closer to the wall. Using the Blackboard view setting helps. Overall, really impressed with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Polarbearface

customer_reviews.title: This projector is effing awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a projector before so naturally I was pretty anxious about this purchase. I did a ton of research and finally decided on this one for several reasons...best $800 I've spent in a long time. It has pretty much doubled and maybe even tripled my expectations. Stop debating and just buy it - trust me you won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: well worth the 💰 money
customer_reviews.text: It's my first one so nothing to compare it to but I really like it picture quality is good but not great at 106 inches of you need the best pic quality and short throw get the gt1080 the sound is weak. But that's ok it gets hot but I never notice the fan noise
customer_reviews.author: chris foster

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for short distances.
customer_reviews.text: amazing for short distances. And in long distances the image is giant but really good quality. Just in this case, you have to move the projector to the distance you want it because the zoom in and out is really short. Tho I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grosskopf

customer_reviews.title: OPTOMA GT750E Gaming Projector 3D
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for both gaming and watching movies. Unlike other projectors which are "3D Ready" this one actually is without needed a external 3D processor. I didn't buy a 3D Blu Ray player yet and used my PS3 to test the 3D feature. This projector played 3D games and blu ray films straight out of the box without changing anything in the menu. I bought mine from consignia.ca and their service was great. Even though item came from Canada it arrived with USPS within 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: maurinquina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect projector for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and bright projector. It met all my ecpectations after trying 2 other products using the same technology. No computer required for this projector. Good buy and happy with it. I gave this to my son in taly and i will purchase another one for myself before this month as a gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: conravil

customer_reviews.title: perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Waited for over a month to do a review. Wanted to wait and see. No problems works great. Very happy and just in time for longhorn football.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item using it as I'm typing really good for game
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I recommend it shipped on time thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector
customer_reviews.text: We are using this projector for presentation and teaching purposes instead of gaming as it is intended to be. Great quality images. Easy set-up. Great packaging and early delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time for my video game - a must have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very short throw distance
customer_reviews.text: you only need about 3 feet to make a 70" screen. great for video games, movies or anything really. still gotta close the shades in the windows and turn the lights off. darker the better. If your looking for a projector to use with open windows and lights on then this one probably isnt for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: OWNED THIS FOR 2 YEARS AND I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Ive always wanted a projector. Been using this with a screen i bought on here and couldnt be happier its bright, the color is great, i havent tried the 3d yet. cant think of anything wrong with it. best gaming prjector for your money
customer_reviews.author: thomas hart

customer_reviews.title: im in love.
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this projector. highly recommended if you dont have the space and need a huge picture .
customer_reviews.author: The Mackanator

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Some blur.
customer_reviews.text: We love this projector. We use it for both movies and video games. We set it up as a ceiling mount about 6 feet back from the wall. At that distance, our screen is ten feet wide. The only issue we have with it is some slight motion blur on FIFA 13. For the price, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good projector, just be sure you understand the trade-offs at this cost point
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and bright projector. Love the 'short throw' feature so that the projector can be closer to the wall/screen and still throw a very large image. Very bright. Fast startup time. Good intuitive menu. I wish it had built in wifi for management, but at this price level, thats a tradeoff i was willing to make. Also would be nice to have more than 1 HDMI input, but again, it was a tradeoff for this cost level.
customer_reviews.author: D Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! - The image is awesome, - doesn't get too hot, - the sound is good (I was expecting nothing, so I got pretty impress. Even it didn't have a very good bass, though), - turn on/off in about 15 seconds, - full 1080p, - great 3D (I bought the SainSonic SSZ-200DLB Glasses to use with it), - very portable with the backpack, - easy to use - And last but not least, GREAT price comparing to other models. Really an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Wow what an awesome projector
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on different projectors, went with this one for the low price, 1080P resolution, and the 3D capability. I've had the projector for at least 6 months now and still love it. It sits about 10 feet back from the wall on the ground, projects a 18feet x 9 foot screen, its amazing!! When you playing video games or watching movies its like you are really there. I have only used the 3D option once and it was pretty decent, as its just being projected on a pored wall the 3D wasnt the best, but im sure on a proper screen, or a silver screen it would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Prefect

customer_reviews.title: Projector for Games
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, best for gaming. the projector miss the zoom function and you will need to move the projector for best image size. 100 Inc from 1.5M projection distance.
customer_reviews.author: koby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Projector, exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Projector, exceeded our expectations. I was worried about the picture being washed out in a brightly light environment, but it is plenty bright, very sharp, and great color. Would absolutely recommend. We received it quickly, and arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Oeschler

customer_reviews.title: awesome projector
customer_reviews.text: awesome projector. short range is its biggest pro. no cons.... would purchase again. hopefully it lasts awhile before I have to replace any parts. only had it for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit to Our Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. We used this in a banquet hall for an audience of 2000+ with great success. It was one of two used in the hall, one on each side of the stage. We will be purchasing one more to replace the house left projector. We feed it HDMI from a HD-SDI source through a converter.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT

customer_reviews.title: Best gift i ever bought for myself.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for the money you cant go wrong 700 bucks for a picture of up to 300" wow. This is by far the best gift i have ever bought for myself.If youre a gamer or just a movie buff this unit is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Allen Brown III

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my daughters wedding
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this projector to anyone, easy to use and works great. I used it at my daughters wedding for a slide show of the the bride and groom. Priced right.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great projector. I love that it has a short throw and lets people play the Kinect in my theater room without getting into the screen.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming.. but
customer_reviews.text: The projector is great works wonderfully with my Xbox one. Bright clear image. I leave on eco+ mode and it works great. Only problem is I already have to replace the lamp..... I've only had it about 3 months!!! That's crazy. I'm a little ticked off. I work part time and I'm a full time student I don't use it daily. I shouldn't have to replace that already...
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: safe bet
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to all the hype for the price,Gaming is good ,lag is not noticeable. 3 or 4 thousand dollar projectors must be insanely good if this is what you get for under a $1000.

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good. I have it mounted 6ft away from a ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good. I have it mounted 6ft away from a 120in screen works good with my xbox one and 360

customer_reviews.title: Optima Gt760 home theater
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Gives me 13.5 feet wide image at 10.6 feet from screen. It's bright enough even with lights on. Its Fan, very silent. Great for movies, and home theater.
customer_reviews.author: preston wambua

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great product, very effective in short throw. Quality/price ratio is high. i definitely reccommend this product. No need to dark place...
customer_reviews.author: Faruk Emre Tekin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 3D projector for the PS3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with a Universal ceiling mount and use it as my Primary TV in my living room. Picture is great, 3D functionality is really cool with the PS3 and it is nice not needing to have any additional converter boxes (3D-XL). It has been up and running for 2 days now. Awesome Product. Cons: I wish this projector had a Lens Shift to allow for more flexible mounting positions. I wish their were some more options for 3D glasses that Support DLP Link. Overall: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome projector! You get exactly what you pay for and more because it also has 3D features!

customer_reviews.text: i purchased this along with an outdoor projection screen and wanted to share that its an amazing purchase, everyone should have a 3d projector...

customer_reviews.text: Far and away the best projector I've owned and at a price far less then I expected. After 6 months of constant use I have no problems to report

customer_reviews.text: This projector has a beautiful picture. It's hard to distinguish the difference between the projector and a television. The colors are great

customer_reviews.title: Good Projector

product_meta.title: Optoma GT750E, HD (720p), 3000 ANSI Lumens, 3D-Gaming Projector (Old Version)
product_meta.description:
Style:GT750EOPTOMA TECHNOLOGY 2D/3D 720P 3000 LMS 3000:1 CONTRAST TWO HDMI VGA-IN S-VIDEOCOMPOSITE AUDI2D/3D 720P 3000 LMS 3000:1 CONTRAST TWO HDMI VGA-IN S-VIDEOCOMPOSITE AUDIO-IN/OUT VESA 3D PORT 10W SPEAKER 1 YEAR WARRANTY Manufacturer : OPTOMA TECHNOLOGY UPC : 796435417437

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


DELIVERING THE ULTIMATE EXPERIENCE TO SERIOUS GAMERS
The Optoma GT750E GameTime projector is yet another impressive addition to Optoma's extensive line of 3D home entertainment and gaming projectors. This compact gaming enabler offers a feature-rich and comprehensive solution for hardcore and casual gamers alike. The projector, which comes with an RF emitter, aims to deliver every feature neccessary for the best gaming experience. Designed for flawless performance with today's top HD consoles and gaming PCs, the GT750E gaming projector energizes game play with stunning speed, high contrast and vivid colors. The short throw design lets users capture big screen performance even in small rooms. With just a five feet throw distance, gamers can get approximately 90-inch bright images.

Including a variety of connectivity options (including two HDMI and one component connector), the GT750E gaming projector provides users excellent flexibility in their gaming and home entertainment setup. In addition to solid brightness and an exceptional contrast ratio, the GT750E GameTime projector includes built-in 10-watt stereo speakers for booming sound and a backpack for easy travel.

Unlock the full experience of your Wii, Xbox or PlayStation with widescreen immersive gaming on the big screen. Projecting images of up to 322.4 inches, this gaming projector delivers cinema-sized fun in a portable package.




FEATURES:
 * DLP Link 120Hz 3D-capable display technology or RF 3D technology options
 * Bright at 3000 ANSI lumens with a high contrast ratio of 3000:1
 * 2D/3D 1080p signal inputs directly
 * Native widescreen display, with support of up to 2D or 3D 720p resolution
 * Powerful audio – Built-in 10-watt stereo speaker system
 * Flexible connectivity options– Two HDMI, VGA, S-video, Composite, Stereo RCA Audio-in, Stereo Audio-out & RS-232
 * Decodes all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format and SBS format commonly used by Blu-Ray 3D players, game consoles and set-top boxes

3D READY DELIVERS THE FUTURE OF ENTERTAINMENT TODAY
The 3D-capable GT750E gaming projector comes ready to deliver the full impact of your favorite games and movies. The GT750E entertainment projector processes 1080p input down to 720p for 3D. The availability of 3D content, including games and movies, is exploding with new titles released every month. The Optoma GT750E brings the ultimate gaming experience you want today, with the added ability to take advantage of 3D content when you choose.

The projector supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D formats, side-by-side format and top and bottom format to allow users easy hook up with peripherals that can deliver 3D content. As a full 1080p, it supports all 1080p formats natively without requiring an Optoma 3D-XL converter box. As with all 3D displays, a 3D source (such as a 3D Blu-Ray player or gaming system), 3D content and 3D glasses are required for 3D viewing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART DLP TECHNOLOGY
Optoma projectors with Texas Instrument's DLP with BrilliantColor technology feature multi-color processing to produce accurate and vibrant colors on the screen. The GT750E multi-color processing system features a six-segment color wheel coated with an advanced material that achieves superb color saturation and accuracy for extraordinary image quality. In addition, incredibly high native contrast ratios ensure clean and crisp blacks and whites to ensure that text and charts are easy to read.

LOWER COST OF OWNERSHIP
The projection lamp is rated to last up to 4000 hours in standard mode or 3000 hours in bright mode to provide long-lasting performance. The GT750E gaming projector also incorporates a rapid shutdown feature that further reduces ownership costs.

GREEN BY DESIGN
As part of the Optoma ProJect Green program, Optoma's GameTime entertainment projectors are designed and manufactured for eco-friendliness. These projectors:




 * Use less than one-watt power consumption in standby mode—Up to 75 percent savings compared to regular standby mode.
 * Are designed to limit energy use, with automatic shut down and remote management and control.
 * Employ long-life materials and components.
 * Use components that are lead-free on all printed circuit boards.
 * Use no polystyrene foam in the packing materials
 * Comply with RoHS standards to phase out the use of hazardous materials.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
This package includes the Optoma GT750E projector, one remote control with batteries, RF emitter for 3D glasses, one composite video cable, one lens cap, an A/C power cord, multilingual CD-ROM user's manual and quick-start card.

SPECIFICATIONS
Display Technology 0.65" DC3 DMD DLP Technology by Texas Instruments Resolution Native WXGA (1280 x 800), 2D 720p, 3D Brightness (Bright Mode) 3000 ANSI Lumens Maximum Resolution VGA: UXGA (1600 x 1200), HDMI: 1080p Light Source Lamp Contrast Ratio 3000:1 (Full On/Full Off) Lamp Life 4000/3000 Hours Projection Distance 1.64" to 15.4" inches Image Size (Diagonal) 32.2" to 322.4" 3D Compatibility Supports all HDMI 1.4a mandatory 3D format, side-by-side format and top and bottom format Audio Two 5-Watt Stereo Speakers Remote Control IR Remote Computer Compatibility HD, UXGA, SXGA+, WXGA, SXGA, XGA, SVGA, VGA Resized, VESA, PC and Macintosh Compatible Video Input Compatibility NTSC, PAL, SECAM, SDTV (480i), EDTV (480p), HDTV (720p, 1080i/p), 3D HDTV (720p, 1080p) I/O Connectors Two HDMI, VGA-In, S-video, Composite Video, Stereo RCA Audio-In, Stereo Audio-out, VESA 3D port & RS-232 Weight 6.6 lbs (3.kg) Dimensions 12.76" x 3.82" x 9.21" Power In AC Input 100-240V, 50-60Hz, Auto-Switching Power Consumption 330 Watts (Bright), 270 Watts (STD),<0.5 Watt (Standby) Warranty One-Year Limited Parts and Labor, 90-Days Lamp WHICH OPTOMA PROJECTOR IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
